column4: osiandɛ hom nyim dɛ hɛn akyerɛkyerɛfo yi na wobobu hɛn atsɛn kɛse."

column2: "Na hɛn nyina yɛfom ndzɛmba pii mu. Sɛ obi mmfom asɛm mu a
column3: ɔno na ɔyɛ nyimpa a odzi mu a otum dɛ ɔdze ewur to ne nyimpadua nyinara so mu."

column2: "Na sɛ yɛdze ndabraka to mpɔnkɔ anomu ma wotsie hɛn a

column3: wɔsoso araa ma mframa a ano yɛ dzen na opia hɔn
column4: naaso wɔdze kutow kakraba dandan hɔn kɔ beebiara a hɛnkitsafo no pɛ."

column2: "Dɛmara na tɛkyerɛma yɛ honam ho adze kakraba
column3: naaso ɔhyehyɛ noho wɔ adze kɛse ho. Hom nhwɛ mbrɛ ogya ketseketse so tum hyew kwaa kɛse!"

column2: "Na tɛkyerɛma so yɛ ogya. Hɛn mfafakuwa nyinara mu
column3: tɛkyerɛma na ayɛ dɛ emumuyɛ wiadze wɔ mu
column4: na ogu nyimpadua nyina ho fi
column5: na ɔsɔ ɔbra kwan nyina gya
column6: na wofi hɛɛl sɔ no so gya."

column3: nye aweaweambowa nye dza ɔwɔ po mu no
column5: na nyimpa dze hɔn su adwedwe hɔn:"

column3: nyimpa biara nntum nndwedwe no; ɔyɛ adzebɔn a wɔhom do a ɔnnhom
na ɔnoara so na yɛdze dom nyimpa a wɔayɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn suban mu:"

column2: "ano kor no ara na nhyira nye ndom fi mu ba. Mo nuanom
column3: ɔnnsɛ dɛ iyinom ba no dɛm koraa."

column2: "Aso nsubura bi puw nsu dɛɛdɛw nye wenwen fi nsunyiwa kor mu?"

column3: ana adɔmbadua botum asow ngodua aba? Anaaso wenyindua botum asow adɔmba? Dɛmara na nsu nkyenkyen runntum mmba nsu pa."

column2: "Hom mu woana na ɔyɛ nyansafo nye nyimdzefo? Wɔmma ɔmfa ɔbra pa nkyerɛ no ndwuma wɔ ɔdwe a nyansa wɔ mu mu."
"Na sɛ hom wɔ nyinkun wenwen nye mansotwe wɔ hom akoma mu a
column4: na hom nndzi ator nntsia nokwar no."

column2: "Nnyɛ yi nye nyansa a ofi sor
column3: na mbom dza ofi asaase nye honam nye abɔnsam no a."

column2: "Na mbrɛ nyinkun nye mansotwe wɔ no
column3: hɔ na sakasaka nye adze a ɔyɛ tan nyina wɔ."

column2: "Na nyansa a ofi sor no dze
column3: dza odzi kan nye dɛ no ho tsew
column7: ehumbɔbɔr nye aba pa ahyɛ no ma

column2: "Na tsenenee aba wodua no tsenenee mu ma hɔn a wɔyɛ asomdwee adze."
